TopicTitle: CraftBrowser class does not work with default skin

Articles.Content:
Pass HighLogic.Skin to the CraftBrowser constructor and it works fine, but if you pass it the default skin obtained via

GUISkin defaultSkin = (GUISkin)GameObject.Instantiate(GUI.skin);

the CraftBrowser constructor will put up an empty window. Didn't test with any other skins...
